sentences: Ta on õppinud kogu tema elu üksnes enda isale.
Miks sa ei olnud siis eelmisel nädalal õppinud?
Ma ei mõista, miks nad pole kunagi õppinud.
context: 'Õppinud' means that someone has studied or learned something. It is often used to describe the process of acquiring knowledge through study or experience.
